snippet.title: Marvel Rivals | Rivals 'Til the End |  Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
With the timestream on the brink of collapse, it's time for our heroes to rise!

From Tokyo 2099 to the Intergalactic Empire of Wakanda, Hydra Charteris Base, and Klyntar, Galacta has assembled more heroes to take on the ultimate challenge. Who will you choose as your main to save the Multiverse on December 6th?

🎮 Pre-download begins at 00:00 UTC on December 4th, 2024, on Steam and our official website! Don't miss your chance to get ready for launch day. 
 
Console players, hang tight! Your download will unlock on launch day on December 6th, 2024!
 
🎶 Shout out to @chrissycostanza for performing on Rivals 'Til the End (Chrissy Costanza Version) that's fueling our heroes' journey!

Wishlist Marvel Rivals now on:  
Steam: https://t.co/IPhy0Of1cG 
PlayStation: https://t.co/FR0aVfTmcn  
Xbox: https://t.co/GaAYz7Nku6  
Epic Games: https://t.co/QXoxz0VAP7  

Follow #MarvelRivals for the latest news:
🔹 Discord:https://discord.gg/marvelrivals
🔹 Twitter:https://twitter.com/MarvelRivals
🔹 Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/marvelrivals/
🔹 Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/marvelrivals/
🔹 Tiktok:https://www.tiktok.com/@marvelrivals
🔹 Twitch:https://www.twitch.tv/marvelrivals

#MarvelRivals #Marvel #MarvelGames #RivalsTiltheEnd
